mapper.select: select no, title, writer, contact, age, breed, location, gender, img, thumbimg, missingdate, name, dpchknum from missingboard where (title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%') or contents like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%') or breed like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%') or writer like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')) and location like concat('%', #{location}) and animal like concat('%', #{animal}) and category like concat('%', #{category}) order by registerdate desc limit #{startNum}, #{postPerPage}
mapper.insert: insert into missingboard(title, writer, password, animal, breed, name, age, gender, location, dlocation, contents, contact, img, thumbimg, missingdate) values (#{title}, #{writer}, sha1(md5(#{password})), #{animal}, #{breed}, #{name}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{location}, #{dlocation}, #{contents}, #{contact}, #{img}, #{thumbimg}, #{missingdate})
mapper.update: update missingboard set title=#{title}, animal=#{animal}, breed=#{breed}, name=#{name}, age=#{age}, gender=#{gender}, location=#{location}, dlocation=#{dlocation}, contents=#{contents}, contact=#{contact}, img=#{img}, thumbimg=#{thumbimg}, missingdate=#{missingdate} where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from missingboard where (title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%') or contents like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')) and location like concat('%', #{location}) and animal like concat('%', #{animal}) and category like concat('%', #{category})
mapper.update: update missingboard set category = #{category} where no = #{no}
update missingboard set readcount = readcount+1 where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select readtime from missingreadcntprocess where ipaddress = #{ipaddress} and readno = #{readno} order by readtime desc limit 1
mapper.update: update missingboard set likecount = likecount + 1 where no = #{no}
update missingboard set likecount = likecount - 1 where no = #{no}
mapper.delete: delete from missingboardbookmark where no = #{no} and userid = #{userid};
mapper.select: select likecount from missingboard where no = #{no}
select * from missingboardbookmark where no = #{no} and userid = #{userid}
select no, title, writer, contact, age, breed, location, gender, img, thumbimg, missingdate, name, dpchknum from missingboard where category='missing' and no != #{no} order by rand() limit 0, 20;

select no, title, writer, contact, age, breed, location, gender, img, thumbimg, missingdate, name, dpchknum from missingboard where category='missing' and animal=#{animal} and no != #{no} order by rand() limit 0, 20;
